Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: @ry could you please look into this or ask infra team to look into this inconsistent failures with the network instability.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Tested new URL on x86_64 builds nodes and it's working as expected.. Submitted patch with new URL https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/12369/
